entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. Periods of rain beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016
